item.title: Shop help pI
item.dc:creator: @igotguts3 igotguts3
item.description:
@igotguts3 wrote:

hear is my new shop

case 518:
if (c.isDoantor > 4) {
} else
c.sendMessage(“You need to be a donator to view this shop”);
c.getShops().openShop(78);
c.sendMessage(“You currently have <col=255>” + c.pkPoints + " PKP.");
break;

i am getting this error
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1411: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable isDoantor
location: class server.model.players.Client
if (c.isDoantor) {
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.

Press any key to continue . . .

c.isDonator = 1;

item.title: Shop help pI
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Is the isDonator type a boolean or an int?

//For the boolean it would be this
case 518: 
            if (c.isDonator){
            c.getShops().openShop(78);
            c.sendMessage("You currently have <col=255>" +             c.pkPoints + "</col> PKP.");
}
         break;

(Excuse my conventions)

//For an int it would be this
case 518: 
            if (c.isDonator > 4){
            c.getShops().openShop(78);
            c.sendMessage("You currently have <col=255>" +             c.pkPoints + "</col> PKP.");
}
         break;

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help pI
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

c represents the player client, IF the player © IS A DONATOR then open the shop.

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/if.html
